Board of Directors

Name: Ms. Kasturi Chellaraja
Start Date:

Kasturi is one of Sri Lankaâ€™s most respected business leaders and was Group managing director of the Hemas Group before moving to Singapore to become COO of a global business. She also remains a board member of the Ceylon Chamber of Commerce amongst other things.

More: https://www.linkedin.com/in/kasturi-chellaraja-wilson-543734a/

Name: Ms. Sanduni Wickramasinghe
Start Date:

Sanduni is a lawyer specializing in privacy and data protection. She was previously at Mobitel and is now running her own consultancy business. She was part of the team that defined the data protection and privacy acts in Sri Lanka.

More: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sanduniwickramasinghe/

Name: Dr. Ruvan Weerasinghe
Start Date:

Ruvan was at the University of Colombo School of Computing for 20+ years including a stint as its Dean. Ruvan is now at IIT, a private university in Sri Lanka. He has been working on AI and support for local languages for a long time.

More: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ruvanweerasinghe/

Name: Dr. Paul G Biondich
Start Date:

Paul is a professor of pediatric medicine at Indiana University and has been working on digital health technologies for a long time. He is the founder of OpenMRS, the global standard open source medical record system and also OpenHIE (Health Information Exchange).

More: https://www.linkedin.com/in/pbiondich/

Name: Dr. Sanjiva Weerawarana
Start Date:

Sanjiva is the co-founder of LSF, WSO2, the Lanka Data Foundation and the Avinya Foundation. He is also a Member of the Apache Software Foundation, was a Board Member of the Open Source Initiative and is a Fellow of the National Academy of Sciences of Sri Lanka.

More: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sanjivaweerawarana/

Lanka Software Foundation

  • Lanka Software Foundation
  • contact@opensource.lk
  • LSFLK

Lanka Software Foundation is a non-profit organization that promotes the development of Free and Open Source Software (FOSS) in Sri Lanka by giving Sri Lankan developers the environement, facilities and support they need to create and maintain FOSS projects.
